author: cnbc.com
title: AVX Corporation Declares Dividend
text:
FOUNTAIN INN, S.C.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The Board of Directors of AVX Corporation (NYSE: AVX ) recently declared a dividend of $0.115 per common share for the quarter ended March 31, 2018.
The dividend will be paid to shareholders of record on June 15, 2018 and will be disbursed on June 29, 2018.
AVX, headquartered in Fountain Inn, South Carolina, is a leading manufacturer and supplier of a broad line of passive electronic components, interconnect devices and related products.
Please visit our website at www.avx.com .
